post:
INCLOUDIBLY - http://incloudibly.com is a Zurich-based web hosting company offering DDoS Protected Dedicated Servers, DDoS Protected Cloud Hosting, DDoS Protected Colocation in Europe, DDos Protected Camfrog room hosting and professional DDoS Protection service.

★ Pay for the Cloud VPS only, get 10 Gb/s / 4 Mpps lifetime DDoS protection free-of-charge. Starting at just 60.00 CHF (64.20 USD / 49.20 EUR). ★

What you get with every Cloud Hosting order:

  1. RAPID DEPLOYMENT - be online within minutes.
  2. FREE LIFETIME PROTECTION AGAINST DDOS ATTACKS UP 10 Gb/s - get protected from any TCP/UDP based attack with up to 10 gbit/s rate (enough to mitigate against 90% of attacks known).
  3. COST EFFICIENCY - grow steadily, pay only for resources that you need.
  4. EASY SCALABILITY & FLEXIBILITY - add resources on the fly to handle high-load peaks, get back to your regular configuration when peak is over.
  5. REDUCED DATA LOSS RISK - multiple mirrored physical data storages eliminate the risk of data loss.
  6. HIGH AVAILABILITY / 99.9% UPTIME SLA - Incloudibly has been built with redundancy in mind, downtime is not an option.
  7. IOS & ANDROID APPS - easily manage and control your cloud nodes on the go.
  8. UP TO 22% OFF - save up to 22% on your purchase.
  9. + MANY OTHER FEATURES

What makes us really different?
We offer FREE DDOS PROTECTION against attacks up to 10Gb/s with every Dedicated server, Cloud Hosting, Camfrog Room Hosting and Colocation order. This is not a limited promo but the lifetime free of charge service.

★ What is the Free DDOS Protection solution that Incloudibly offers?
Technically, Free DDoS Protection Solution that is supplied with every dedicated server and cloud node is a L4 transparent firewall & traffic analyser that is capable of mitigating against all TCP, UDP, ICMP based attacks with up to 10Gb/s rate. Free DDoS Protection does not guarantee 99.9% DDoS attack mitigation, however, based on our statistics and experience this solution mitigates against 90% of attacks known.

★ Free 7-Day Trial
Should you need to try Incloudibly's DDoS protected Cloud Hosting before you pay for monthly subscription, please do not hesitate to request free 7-day trial.

★ Custom Configuration
One of major advantages of Cloud hosting over traditional VPS/Dedicated hosting is instant scalability. Make your custom Cloud Server configuration and pay only for resources that you nedd.

★ Discounts up to 22%
You can save up to 22% on your purchase if you choose the 12-month billing period. Basically, the longer the billing period you choose, the higher the discount is.

★ Data Center location
Our Datacenter is located in the geographic center of Western Europe - Zurich, Switzerland.
